struct  rebind

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class thrust::device_new_allocator< T >

device_new_allocator is a device memory allocator that employs the device_new function for allocation.

See also:
device_new

device_ptr

http://www.sgi.com/tech/stl/Allocators.html
